string.name: name
string.value: The Truth About Dr. De Lang

After reading #t4161031#, #p2040050# realized what #p2111002# wanted was...really nothing significant. He felt sad about the whole situation, and as he observed the note, something caught #p2040050#'s eyes as he realized there was a hidden message on the back of the note. He then mentioned that #b#p2020005##k might be the person to talk to to reveal the hidden message.
A great alchemist who served as the 3rd president of the Alchemist Union in #m261000000#... That's #p2020005#.

What #p2111002# wanted was... actually that. He seemed to be so happy that he fell in love with someone... and for him to take this extreme measure... sigh. What #p2111002# wanted was in fact, so trivial and empty like this. I guess love painted #p2111002# in the corner.

Wait a minute, there's something weird about this note. It looks like there's a huge blank space after the last sentence. It looks like some alchemy was applied to this... I am sorry, but this is the most we can read with my abilities, but... I can introduce you to someone who is capable of uncovering this blank.
The person who can uncover the hidden notes is #b#p2020005##k. He was the 3rd president of the Alchemy Society, so I am pretty sure he knows a way to extract the hidden message from this note.
If you are not interested, then I don't know what to say...
Hmm? What is it? What? You want me to extract the hidden message in this note? Let me see what this note is about...
Haven't you met with #b#p2020005##k yet? He's currently conducting experiments at #b#m211000000##k, so I suggest you make your way there soon.

I found out you lost #t4161031#. There are so many people passing through, that someone found this dropped note, and it found its way back to me. It took me a while to regain this note, so please don't lose it again.
